Ram-headed devils with wings and flesh of rusted metal, ferrugons prefer temptation to fighting. They're forged from the souls of damned mortals who made others suffer through their creative work. They like to collect those of the same ilk, often by dipping the bodies of mortals they've driven to despair into molten metal to make horrifically malformed statues they add to their lairs. **[Recall Knowledge - Fiend](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 32 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 30 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 27 [Ferrugon](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2519) **Source** [Pathfinder #190: The Choosing](/Sources.aspx?ID=198) pg. 86 **Perception** +22; [greater darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12) **Languages** [Celestial](/Languages.aspx?ID=16), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2), [Infernal](/Languages.aspx?ID=19), [Terran](/Languages.aspx?ID=22); [telepathy](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=37) 100 feet **Skills** [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +25, [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +22, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +21, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +23, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +22, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +23, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) +25 **Str** +7 **Dex** +5 **Con** +6 **Int** +4 **Wis** +4 **Cha** +5 --- **AC** 33 **Fort** +24 **Ref** +20 **Will** +21 +1 status to all saves vs. [magic](/Traits.aspx?ID=103) **HP** 190 **Immunities** [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72) **Resistances** physical 10 (except [silver](/Equipment.aspx?ID=379)) **Weaknesses** good 10 **Metallic** A ferrugon is a metallic creature and thus affected by effects such as [_rusting grasp_](/Spells.aspx?ID=711).
**Vainglorious Whispers** ([divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [enchantment](/Traits.aspx?ID=61), [linguistic](/Traits.aspx?ID=101), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) **Trigger** A non-[devil](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=30) creature within 30 feet of the ferrugon succeeds (but doesn't critically succeed) at an attack roll, skill check, or saving throw; **Effect** The ferrugon whispers subversive messages to the triggering creature, causing it to become overly confident in its abilities, while in fact it becomes less accomplished overall. The target must attempt a DC 32 Will save. On a failure, the target gains a +2 status bonus to saving throws against [fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68) effects but also takes a –2 penalty to all attack rolls and skill checks for 1 hour. During this time, the victim can't benefit from [Aid](/Actions.aspx?ID=75) reactions, use [healing](/Traits.aspx?ID=89) effects on themselves, or use [Take Cover](/Actions.aspx?ID=90) or [Raise a Shield](/Actions.aspx?ID=98) actions, as these actions seem unnecessary to the creature at this time. Similar defensive actions might not be available to the victim as well, at the GM's discretion. The target is then temporarily immune to Vainglorious Whispers for 24 hours. --- **Speed** 25 feet, fly 40 feet **Melee** horn +25 ([Evil](/Traits.aspx?ID=64), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Shove](/Traits.aspx?ID=193), [cold iron](/Traits.aspx?ID=131)), **Damage** 3d8+13 bludgeoning plus 1d6 evil **Melee** claw +25 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Evil](/Traits.aspx?ID=64), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [cold iron](/Traits.aspx?ID=131)), **Damage** 3d4+13 slashing plus 1d6 evil and ferrugon tetanus **Ranged** iron feather +23 ([Evil](/Traits.aspx?ID=64), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [range increment 40 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [cold iron](/Traits.aspx?ID=131)), **Damage** 3d4+13 piercing plus ferrugon tetanus **Divine Innate Spells** DC 32, attack +24 - **4th** [Dimension Door](/Spells.aspx?ID=69) (at will), [Rusting Grasp](/Spells.aspx?ID=711) (×3), [Suggestion](/Spells.aspx?ID=315) - **5th** [Creation](/Spells.aspx?ID=54), [Dimension Door](/Spells.aspx?ID=69), [Shatter](/Spells.aspx?ID=279), [Wall of Stone](/Spells.aspx?ID=365) (×3; wall is made of rusty iron, not stone) - **6th** [Flesh to Stone](/Spells.aspx?ID=123) (target is transformed into rusty iron, not stone) **Rituals** DC 32 - **1st** [Infernal Pact](/Rituals.aspx?ID=23) **Ferrugon Tetanus** ([Disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46)) **Saving Throw** DC 32 Fortitude; **Onset** 1d4 days; **Stage 1** [clumsy 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=3) (1 week); **Stage 2** clumsy 2 and can't speak (1 day); **Stage 3** [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28) (1 day); **Stage 4** death **Sunder Objects** When a ferrugon damages an item or structure, they deal an additional 2d8 damage to that item or structure.
Makers of Rust A ferrugon's [_flesh to stone_](/Spells.aspx?ID=123) and [_wall of stone_](/Spells.aspx?ID=365) innate spells result in rusted iron objects instead of stone. Since this iron is rusted and flawed, it shares the same physical statistics as the stone created by the spells themselves and is too low-quality to serve as a source for forging metal objects.
name: Ferrugon
